name: SSF6
title: Site-Specific Factor 6
subtitle: Chromosome 6p Status
notes:
**Note 1:**  A central part of the short arm of chromosome 6 (6p) may contain one or more oncogenes directly involved in tumor progression.

**Note 2:**  A gain in chromosomes may also be termed "multiple copies" or "greater than normal."
